name: Scourge of Viscerus
summary: Scourge of Viscerus is 7-level hub-based mod for Hexen. It was created by Matt Tropiano (MTrop) and released on July 1, 2010. Set several years after the defeat of the Deathkings, the players must venture out to stop a demon named Viscerus, who seeks to resurrect them in order to conquer the world of Cronos. Scourge of Viscerus features new boss enemies and new music tracks.
